snippet: Lawyers for Gilberto Valle, 28, who faces a possible life sentence, declined to detail their strategy, but said they intended to vigorously pursue their client’s postconviction options.
abstract: Lawyers for former New York City Police Officer Gilberto Valle, who faces a possible life sentence after his conviction of planning to kidnap, kill and eat women, decline to detail their strategy, but say they intend to vigorously pursue their client’s options.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Gilberto Valle, 28, who faces a possible life sentence, declined to detail their strategy, but said they intended to vigorously pursue their client’s postconviction options.

headline.seo: Defense in Cannibal Case Faces Next Steps
headline.main: Defense in Cannibal Case Faces Next Steps
headline.print_headline: Defense in Cannibal Case Faces Next Steps
